title: Strengthening Deep Learning Practical Skills: RF Energy Harvesting Design Simulation Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational electromagnetics, circuit design principles, basic Python programming, and understanding of machine learning concepts
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain the functions of components in an RF energy harvesting system (antenna, IMN, VM).
Learners can apply frequency-time conversion and multi-output regression models using simulation tools.
Learners can establish strategies to achieve over 50% PCE by optimizing 3D antenna design parameters (length/width/thickness) in a VR environment.
Learners can self-diagnose learning outcomes and create improvement plans through formative assessments (quizzes/design challenges).
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
